name: StreamerVsChat - A Twitch Game
description:
In StreamerVsChat the chat members have to defeat the streamer as a boss like in a turn based combat system.

The party formed by 3 units composed by the different types of chat members: 
- Not Subs
- Subs
- Vips
Each unit has different special move and the collaboration between chat spectators is the key to defeat the streamer!

With special commands written by the chat, the move with the max number of vote for each unit will be the one played the following turn.

Mods can also play and they can help the chat or the streamer.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FOR THE STREAMER LOGIN:

You need to put your username, channel name (they are the same normally) and an oauth password to connect the game with your chat.

The oauth password can be obtained in the following site of twitch: https://twitchapps.com/tmi

I don't save any data in the game, so if you want to play more times  just save the password somewhere else.
